column4: has anyone else had HORRIBLE experiences with upgrading to Gutsy... Feisty worked great, and now nothing works right anymore... gutsy is a HUGE step backwards!
i can't suspend or hibernate!
i shut down my computer like 9 times a day because i always need to suspend and take it to class
my resolution is weird now.. my login splash is nonexistent, and now gutsy takes LONGER to boot than windows!  and compiz fails after alil use
please do wait
until they weed out the bugs
i wish so much that there was a reverse option
it screwed my system - just doing a clean install now
i use thunderbird
clean install of feisty or gutsy again VSpike?
it's called restoring the full system backup you took before upgrading, surely? :)
note, I didnt have one either :D
haha
gutsy - I'm hoping the upgrade was the problem
i would go with feisty
i loved feisty
its what made me a linux user 100%

between feisty and gutsy i lost functionality of so many things, everything is slower, i get crashes and horrible stuff all the time, the only one thing that worked was that a wine install of a windows program i REALLY like finally worked in gutsy... thats the ONLY thing that improved
and i'm not sure if that was wine or the new gutsy version that made it possible
gutsy seems faster for me once I got it working, and nice to have packaged versions of all the stuff I had to find for feisty, like latest thunderbird, firefox, nvidia driver, etc.
it seems different for me, i found i had to do alot of manual work to get things to work in feisty... but finally i had it how i liked it and gutsy removed all functionality
